title: PBE account deactivated
body:
I started playing League way back on another account, i bought the collectors edition for $29.99, and as soon as i found out that PBE was out i applied for it the first chance i got. I figured that i would be able to be a positive force the the community, and i hope i was for the time i had. Even when you guys totally changed some of my most played champs i still kept on playing the game, i have spent alot of time just playing League, time that should´ve probably been spent on homework and evolving my social abilities now that i think about it. But i loved this game with such a passion, although it sometimes makes one rage alot, it still had a special place in the heart. I miss the old way league was, but i understand that a game must constantly have changes to not grow dull and lose intrest amongst the public. 

I got a message from a good friend of mine that i met through the PBE servers, that he wasn´t able to log in and that it said something along the lines that his account was inactive, which we both found weird since we both used to play on the PBE servers alot. So i tried to log in and i got the same message, and it saddens me that these are the kind of changes you guys in development reached for. It doesn´t really make the people who play most of their games on the PBE servers fairly happy, knowing that all of a sudden we just can´t log in, and that we have to wait for the chance of us to get randomly picked (which doesn´t really seem like a good chance). It is just a tad bit disappointing that this is what it has come to, the PBE community were so much more polite than any of the servers i have played on, sure it had a few people who resorted to threats and similar, but it was far too less than any other of the servers. And this new change will probably not effect the PBE community for the better, it will probably just create more angry players and induce a more toxic community. 

Best Regards
Your average somewhat level-headed player

replies.body:
Any PBE account that were not linked to a Live account (NA, EUNE, EUW) or were part of our old PBE system (prior to 10/25/2013) were disabled through a few waves. There were emails sent out to emails associated with these *legacy PBE accounts* that this would be happening and to [reapply for PBE access](https://pbesignup.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe) in the new system.

If you have any questions, please let me know.

I never received an email notifying about legacy PBE accounts. All I know is that my pbe account is very, very old (creation date before the one you stated). I also linked it with my live NA account ages ago as well. 

I also cannot reapply for PBE access because the pbe signup page keeps thinking I have an account still in-use/is active, and says I am ready to test and cannot create a new account. When I ask for my pbe username through the username pbe recovery steps, it gives me back my disabled pbe account username. Is there a way to solve this?

That's pretty strange, I've never heard of that happening before. I recommend reaching out to our account specialists in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) about this so we can investigate further.
Yes, I have done so, and in progress so far. Thanks for the reply.

My PBE account was deactivated as well but every time I try to reapply for another I keep getting the "Something went wrong
Was Ziggs here? Something...blew up on this page. Please give it another shot later" error.

wat do

Does that happen if you try signing up from [this link](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe) after [clearing your browsing data](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) or trying another browser entirely?
thing is that the email that i used to sign up for that pbe account Went Cold and i am still unable to log into it, something about logging in from another Place.

If you're having troubles accessing the email associated with your account, I recommend reaching out to your email provider's support. Most providers let you fill out a questionnaire about the email account and they'll contact you after deciding whether or not they can confirm you as the account creator.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
I'm sorry this happened to you.  I hope your situation is resolved soon.
